verses.verse: רְדִ֣י ׀ <S%H3381><s%> Come down וּשְׁבִ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in עָפָ֗ר <S%H6083><s%> in the dust בְּתוּלַת֙ <S%H1330><s%> O virgin בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon שְׁבִי־ <S%H3427><s%> sit לָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> on the ground אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> without כִּסֵּ֖א <S%H3678><s%> [there is] no throne בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall no תוֹסִ֙יפִי֙ <S%H3254><s%> for thou shalt no more יִקְרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> be called לָ֔ךְ רַכָּ֖ה <S%H7390><s%> tender וַעֲנֻגָּֽה׃ <S%H6028><s%> and delicate

קְחִ֥י <S%H3947><s%> Take רֵחַ֖יִם <S%H7347><s%> the millstones וְטַ֣חֲנִי <S%H2912><s%> and grind קָ֑מַח <S%H7058><s%> meal גַּלִּ֨י <S%H1540><s%> uncover צַמָּתֵ֧ךְ <S%H6777><s%> thy locks חֶשְׂפִּי־ <S%H2834><s%> make bare שֹׁ֛בֶל <S%H7640><s%> the leg גַּלִּי־ <S%H1540><s%> uncover שׁ֖וֹק <S%H7785><s%> the thigh עִבְרִ֥י <S%H5674><s%> pass over נְהָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H5104><s%> the rivers

תִּגָּל֙ <S%H1540><s%> shall be uncovered עֶרְוָתֵ֔ךְ <S%H6172><s%> Thy nakedness גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> also תֵּרָאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> shall be seen חֶרְפָּתֵ֑ךְ <S%H2781><s%> yea thy shame נָקָ֣ם <S%H5359><s%> vengeance אֶקָּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> I will take וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and will not אֶפְגַּ֖ע <S%H6293><s%> and I will not meet אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> [thee as] a man ס

גֹּאֲלֵ֕נוּ <S%H1350><s%> [As for] our redeemer יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name קְד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

שְׁבִ֥י <S%H3427><s%> Sit דוּמָ֛ם <S%H1748><s%> thou silent וּבֹ֥אִי <S%H935><s%> and get בַחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> thee into darkness בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will no תוֹסִ֙יפִי֙ <S%H3254><s%> for thou shalt no more יִקְרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> be called לָ֔ךְ גְּבֶ֖רֶת <S%H1404><s%> The lady מַמְלָכֽוֹת׃ <S%H4467><s%> of kingdoms

קָצַ֣פְתִּי <S%H7107><s%> I was wroth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with עַמִּ֗י <S%H5971><s%> with my people חִלַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H2490><s%> I have polluted נַחֲלָתִ֔י <S%H5159><s%> mine inheritance וָאֶתְּנֵ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> and given בְּיָדֵ֑ךְ <S%H3027><s%> them into thine hand לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שַׂ֤מְתְּ <S%H7760><s%> thou didst shew לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like רַחֲמִ֔ים <S%H7356><s%> them no mercy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto זָקֵ֕ן <S%H2205><s%> upon the ancient הִכְבַּ֥דְתְּ <S%H3513><s%> heavily עֻלֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5923><s%> laid thy yoke מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> hast thou very

וַתֹּ֣אמְרִ֔י <S%H559><s%> And thou saidst לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever אֶהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will be a גְבָ֑רֶת <S%H1404><s%> I shall be a lady עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor שַׂ֥מְתְּ <S%H7760><s%> [so] that thou didst not lay אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> things עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לִבֵּ֔ךְ <S%H3820><s%> these [things] to thy heart לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor זָכַ֖רְתְּ <S%H2142><s%> neither didst remember אַחֲרִיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H319><s%> the latter end ס

וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שִׁמְעִי־ <S%H8085><s%> Therefore hear זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> you עֲדִינָה֙ <S%H5719><s%> now this [thou that art] given to pleasures הַיּוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> that dwellest לָבֶ֔טַח <S%H983><s%> carelessly הָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <S%H559><s%> that sayest בִּלְבָ֔בָהּ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am וְאַפְסִ֣י <S%H657><s%> I [am] and none else ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> besides לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אֵשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> beside me I shall not sit אַלְמָנָ֔ה <S%H490><s%> [as] a widow וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אֵדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> neither shall I know שְׁכֽוֹל׃ <S%H7908><s%> the loss of children

וְתָבֹאנָה֩ <S%H935><s%> [things] shall come לָּ֨ךְ שְׁתֵּי־ <S%H8147><s%> But these two אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these רֶ֛גַע <S%H7281><s%> to thee in a moment בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> in one שְׁכ֣וֹל <S%H7908><s%> the loss of children וְאַלְמֹ֑ן <S%H489><s%> and widowhood כְּתֻמָּם֙ <S%H8537><s%> upon thee in their perfection בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> they shall come עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> for the multitude כְּשָׁפַ֔יִךְ <S%H3785><s%> of thy sorceries בְּעָצְמַ֥ת <S%H6109><s%> abundance חֲבָרַ֖יִךְ <S%H2267><s%> of thine enchantments מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [and] for the great

וַתִּבְטְחִ֣י <S%H982><s%> For thou hast trusted בְרָעָתֵ֗ךְ <S%H7451><s%> in thy wickedness אָמַרְתְּ֙ <S%H559><s%> thou hast said אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> No רֹאָ֔נִי <S%H7200><s%> None seeth חָכְמָתֵ֥ךְ <S%H2451><s%> me Thy wisdom וְדַעְתֵּ֖ךְ <S%H1847><s%> and thy knowledge הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> they שׁוֹבְבָ֑תֶךְ <S%H7725><s%> it hath perverted וַתֹּאמְרִ֣י <S%H559><s%> thee and thou hast said בְלִבֵּ֔ךְ <S%H3820><s%> in thine heart אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am וְאַפְסִ֥י <S%H657><s%> I [am] and none else עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> besides

וּבָ֧א <S%H935><s%> come עָלַ֣יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and רָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> Therefore shall evil לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תֵדְעִי֙ <S%H3045><s%> upon thee thou shalt not know שַׁחְרָ֔הּ <S%H7837><s%> from whence it riseth וְתִפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and הֹוָ֔ה <S%H1943><s%> and mischief לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תוּכְלִ֖י <S%H3201><s%> upon thee thou shalt not be able כַּפְּרָ֑הּ <S%H3722><s%> to put it off וְתָבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> shall come עָלַ֧יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> on פִּתְאֹ֛ם <S%H6597><s%> upon thee suddenly שׁוֹאָ֖ה <S%H7722><s%> and desolation לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵדָֽעִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> [which] thou shalt not know

עִמְדִי־ <S%H5975><s%> Stand נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now בַחֲבָרַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H2267><s%> now with thine enchantments וּבְרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> and with the multitude כְּשָׁפַ֔יִךְ <S%H3785><s%> of thy sorceries בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> wherein יָגַ֖עַתְּ <S%H3021><s%> thou hast laboured מִנְּעוּרָ֑יִךְ <S%H5271><s%> from thy youth אוּלַ֛י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps תּוּכְלִ֥י <S%H3201><s%> if so be thou shalt be able הוֹעִ֖יל <S%H3276><s%> to profit אוּלַ֥י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps תַּעֲרֽוֹצִי׃ <S%H6206><s%> if so be thou mayest prevail

נִלְאֵ֖ית <S%H3811><s%> Thou art wearied בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> in the multitude עֲצָתָ֑יִךְ <S%H6098><s%> of thy counsels יַעַמְדוּ־ <S%H5975><s%> stand up נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> now וְיוֹשִׁיעֻ֜ךְ <S%H3467><s%> and save [הָבְרוּ כ] (הֹבְרֵ֣י <S%H1895><s%> astrologer ק) שָׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> air הַֽחֹזִים֙ <S%H2374><s%> agreement בַּכּ֣וֹכָבִ֔ים <S%H3556><s%> the stars מֽוֹדִיעִם֙ <S%H3045><s%> prognosticators לֶחֳדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2320><s%> the monthly מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what יָבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> thee from [these things] that shall come עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> have become כְקַשׁ֙ <S%H7179><s%> Behold they shall be as stubble אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire שְׂרָפָ֔תַם <S%H8313><s%> shall burn לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַצִּ֥ילוּ <S%H5337><s%> them they shall not deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשָׁ֖ם <S%H5315><s%> themselves מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> from the power לֶֽהָבָ֑ה <S%H3852><s%> of the flame אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> There גַּחֶ֣לֶת <S%H1513><s%> [there shall] not [be] a coal לַחְמָ֔ם <S%H2552><s%> to warm א֖וּר <S%H217><s%> at [nor] fire לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to sit נֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5048><s%> before

כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So הָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָ֖ךְ אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָגָ֑עַתְּ <S%H3021><s%> Thus shall they be unto thee with whom thou hast laboured סֹחֲרַ֣יִךְ <S%H5503><s%> [even] thy merchants מִנְּעוּרַ֗יִךְ <S%H5271><s%> from thy youth אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לְעֶבְרוֹ֙ <S%H5676><s%> to his quarter תָּע֔וּ <S%H8582><s%> they shall wander אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> There מוֹשִׁיעֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3467><s%> none shall save ס
